title: Episode 42 - American Spy Master J. Edgar Hoover
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode we examine the life of J. Edgar Hoover and his subsequent rise and fall in American politics. We look at the questions surrounding his sexuality. We examine the rumors around his racial background, was Hoover part black? We also explore his ties to the Mob and why he claimed that the Mafia was a hoax.
itunes:subtitle: In this episode we examine the life of J. Edgar Hâ€¦
